overview: From 2025-12-06 to 2025-12-07, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 5 new PRs (3 merged), 0 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topPRs.title: chore(op-acceptance-tests): delete very old logs
topPRs.author: scharissis
topPRs.body: Deletes acceptance-testing log dirs older than 60 days, to prevent the disk from running out of space.

topPRs.title: op-devstack: use file-based sequencer key loading for kona
topPRs.author: DenseDenise
topPRs.body: kona now supports loading sequencer keys from files (op-rs/kona#2871), switched from KONA_NODE_P2P_SEQUENCER_KEY to KONA_NODE_P2P_SEQUENCER_KEY_PATH to match the pattern used for regular p2p keys

topPRs.title: fix: Full checkout for FFI build
topPRs.author: janjakubnanista
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

the FFI build fails with blobless checkouts, this reintroduces `full` checkout for affected builds

topPRs.title: chore(ai-eng): add ReinitializableBase test to exclusion list
topPRs.author: aliersh
topPRs.body:
This PR adds `ReinitializableBase.t.sol` to the static exclusions list to prevent it from blocking the AI test maintenance system while a permanent solution is developed.

### Reason

The AI test maintenance system has consistently selected `ReinitializableBase.t.sol` as the highest-priority test during Monday/Thursday runs, even though it already has comprehensive coverage and requires no improvements. This causes the system to fail each run when it determines no changes are needed, blocking progress on other tests that could benefit from automated maintenance. This is a temporary fix while we develop the `no_changes_needed` exclusion group with automatic re-evaluation logic.

### Changes

- Add `test/universal/ReinitializableBase.t.sol` to the static files exclusion list in exclusion.toml
